import React from 'react'; import { faTrash } from "@fortawesome/free-solid-svg-icons"; import { FontAwesomeIcon } from "@fortawesome/react-fontawesome"; export function ProductList( {products} ): JSX.Element { return (
{products.map((product) => {

{ product.item }

{product.body}

{ product.price } x
})}
) }
